name: FloodyLoops
description:
On the strange planet of FloodLoops, the unprepared adventurer often ends up being swept away by the river's tide. Craft a raft to navigate the flood and go as far as you can! /TEAM
  • code+character design by @alixmic
  • music by @diffty
  • code by @florian_piette
  • art by @tomalego

Created for the Ludum Dare 47
